items.title: B2B Marketing Strategy: Leading with Customer Applications
items.headline: Drive customer intimacy in your B2B marketing initiatives by focusing on their jobs-to-be-done and pain points.
objectives_summary: Generate Customer Preference Earlier in their Journey: Drive customer need recognition and learn how to help customers earlier in their journey so that they prefer your products when they are in a purchase cycle.
Unlock the Power of Free Marketing: Use the power of SEO to show up when customers are searching for how to solve their pain points and get answers for questions on their application.
Increase the Average Selling Price of Your Marketing Opportunities: Market and sell a complete solution for your customers' applications versus individual products.
